databaseThesaurusConfiguration.similarTermsQuery: select word2, count from $tableSimilarTerms where word1=? order by count desc
databaseThesaurusConfiguration.similarTermsTopQuery: select word2, count from $tableSimilarTerms where word1=? order by count desc LIMIT 0, $numberOfEntries
databaseThesaurusConfiguration.similarTermsGtScoreQuery: select word2, count from $tableSimilarTerms where word1=? and count>? ORDER BY count DESC
databaseThesaurusConfiguration.similarTermScoreQuery: select SIM from $tableSimilarTerms where word1=? and word2=?
databaseThesaurusConfiguration.similarContextsQuery: SELECT W2,SIM FROM $tableSimilarContexts WHERE W1 = ? ORDER BY SIM desc
databaseThesaurusConfiguration.similarContextsTopQuery: SELECT W2,SIM FROM $tableSimilarContexts WHERE W1 = ? ORDER BY SIM desc fetch first $numberOfEntries rows only
databaseThesaurusConfiguration.similarContextsGtScoreQuery: SELECT W2,SIM FROM $tableSimilarContexts WHERE W1 = ? and SIM > ? ORDER BY SIM desc
databaseThesaurusConfiguration.termContextsCountQuery: SELECT FREQ FROM $tableTermContextsScore WHERE word =? and feature = ?
databaseThesaurusConfiguration.termContextsScoreQuery: SELECT SIG FROM $tableTermContextsScore WHERE word =? and feature = ?
databaseThesaurusConfiguration.termContextsScoresQuery: SELECT feature, SIG FROM $tableTermContextsScore WHERE word =? ORDER BY SIG desc
databaseThesaurusConfiguration.termContextsScoresTopQuery: SELECT feature, SIG FROM $tableTermContextsScore WHERE word =? ORDER BY SIG limit 0, $numberOfEntries
databaseThesaurusConfiguration.termContextsScoresGtScoreQuery: SELECT feature, SIG FROM $tableTermContextsScore WHERE word =? and SIG > ? ORDER BY SIG desc
databaseThesaurusConfiguration.sensesQuery: select CID,isaS, M from $tableSenses where W= ?
databaseThesaurusConfiguration.senseCUIsQuery: SELECT CID, CUIS_1 FROM $tableSenseCUIs where w=?
databaseThesaurusConfiguration.isasQuery: SELECT CID, ISAS FROM $tableIsas where w=?
